item.title: Changing Max XP From 200M to 500M?
item.dc:creator: @Ace1 Ace.
item.description:
@Ace1 wrote:

Hey guys. Well I just recently changed my maximum level from 99, to 135.

The problem Iâ€™m having, is that whenever I try make my stats level 135, the maximum it goes to is 126 and stops at 200M xp. I would like the maximum xp to be 500M, so that it can actually reach level 135.

This is my current method if it helps:

[code]
public int getLevelForXP(int exp) {
int points = 0;
int output = 0;
if (exp > 500000001)
return 135;
for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 135; lvl++) {
points += Math.floor((double) lvl + 300.0
* Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
if (output >= exp) {
return lvl;
}
}
return 0;
}

[code]
Will give rep if you help.

Thanks!

  • Jackson.[/code]

Read full topic
